name: Carps & Angsty Manatee - Texas Edition

black_cards.text: _: A surprising favorite at the Houston Rodeo this year.

white_cards: A cattle prod to the cooter.
A Fleshlight shaped like the face of George W. Bush.

A New York cheesecake, made in Texas, by a Mexican.

A sexy tractor.  Vast fields of literally nothing.
